subject: Pro x ultra
description_text:
Would there be any reason why axis 4 keeps flickering and when I unplugged every pedal separately but axis 4 keeps flickering and so it won't allow me to assign any of my controlsI don't if it's the control box or the pedals them self

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer

conversations.body_text: Hi Jacob Brewington,  Please uninstall the old version from your computer first, then download and install the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2. In the Settings → Update section, you can update the firmware. After the update, the system will automatically fix and disable the 4th axis (RX axis) issue.            https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
